extension.description:
The Pi-hole is a DNS sinkhole that protects your devices from unwanted content, without installing any client-side software.
On initial install, enter an admin password. Port 53 must be open. By default only IPv4 is enabled. IPv6 can be enabled in addon settings. Server LAN IPs are autodetected, but can be overridden by manual entry in addon settings.
This is a docker addon brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
